1.0.name: wordpress/login-logout-switcher
1.0.description:
Simple widget plugin that Displays "Log In | Log Out" links when user is logged out then switches to Display "Username | Log Out" links when user is logged in. The username includes a hyperlink to the user profile.

Extra Functions

Options Includes

  1. Change hyperlink for Username

  2. Change Background color

  3. Change Text color

  4. Change Links color

HTML Hex Colors Examples

Just some examples ( Words are supportive )

  1. fff , #ccc etc..

  2. white, green, red
